description: Democrats, stop being so fair to El Orange the Dictator in Chief.

subs.text: If Trump were a Democrat making love with Kim Jong Un so openly, that might be a cause for celebration for the Repubs. Trump's running mate in 2020. I doubt if KJU would do anything to jeopardize Trump's re-election. And you know they have hackers too. Hmm. :boom:

And for the Democrats the more you push Trump into the little dictator's crotch, the better the chances for Medicare For All. This is all connected. You want to win? Stop being so fair to El Orange the Dictator in Chief.
